name: Pounded Yam with Efo Riro
Description: Delicious pounded yam served with efo riro, a traditional Nigerian soup made with spinach, tomatoes, and assorted meats.

name: Pounded Yam with Okro Seafood
Description: Delicious pounded yam served with okro seafood, a traditional Nigerian soup made with okra, seafood, and assorted meats.

name: Pounded Yam with Ogbono Soup
Description: Delicious pounded yam served with ogbono soup, a traditional Nigerian soup made with ogbono seeds, spinach, and assorted meats.

name: Pounded Yam with Egusi Soup
Description: Egusi soup is a traditional Nigerian soup made with melon seeds, spinach, and assorted meats. It is often served with pounded yam.

name: Pounded Yam with Banga Soup
Description: Banga soup is a traditional Nigerian soup made with palm nut extract, spinach, and assorted meats. It is often served with pounded yam.
